description: NOTICE OF PROPOSED PROCUREMENT (NPP) For TASK BASED INFORMATICS PROFESSIONAL SERVICES (TBIPS) Reference Number: W6431-230099 Solicitation Number: W6431-230099/A Organization Name: Department of National Defence Solicitation Date: 2023-06-20 Closing Date: 2023-07-07 Contract Duration: The contract period will be for Contract Award to three (3) years later, plus the irrevocable option to extend the contract by one (1) additional one (1) year period.
full_summary:
## Notice of Proposed Procurement (NPP)

### Request for Proposal (RFP)

The Department of National Defence (DND) is seeking a Technology Architect, Level 3 to support the Royal Canadian Air Force’s (RCAF) Innovation Team, Plan Qulliq.

**Request Details**

*   **Reference Number**:	provided in the abstract
*   **Solicitation Number**:	provided in the abstract
*   **Organization Name**: Department of National Defence
*   **Solicitation Date**: Provided in the abstract
*   **Closing Date**: Provided in the abstract

**Contract Duration**

The contract will be for a period of 3 years from the contract award date, with an option to extend the contract for an additional 1 year period.

**Security Requirements**

The contractor must possess a minimum "Designated Organization Screening (DOS)" level of security clearance.

**Method of Solicitation**

This procurement will be conducted under a competitive, selective tendering process.

**Trade Agreements**

This procurement conforms to the following trade agreements:

*   Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
*   World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO-AGP)
*   Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
*   Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
*   Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
*   Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
*   Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
*   Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
*   Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
*   Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
*   Canada-United Kingdom Free Trade Agreement (UKFTA)
*   Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)

**Estimated Level of Effort**

The estimated project duration is 240 days per year.

**Notice URL**

None

**Attachment**

None

**Additional Information**

A complete list of the incumbent's work performance and reference is available upon request.

## Contact Information

*   **Name**: Renee Davis
*   **Phone**: (343) 645-5490
*   **Email**: Renee.Davis@forces.gc.ca

Please note that "canadabuys.canada.ca" is not responsible for distributing solicitation documents. The Crown retains the right to negotiate with any supplier on any procurement.  This  procurement will be conducted in both official languages.

Please ensure to review the required security clearance and other requirements
